FormMeta.name: edinburgh_bulky_uplift

html.name: html_registered_address
html.content: You home address is registered as [txt_address]

html.name: html_VUX83FK8
html.content:
Please click the Add button for each item you select from the list.

You can add as many items as necessary to be assessed.

Please select, from the drop down menu, the items which you require to be collected:

html.name: ahtm_collection_2016-05-13
html_fridge_message
html.content: * Please note that we don't collect these from commercial properties.

html.name: html_assess_message
html.content:
An assessment will need to be carried out to collect the chosen items.

This is because of:

  • The type of waste 
  • The amount

Once you click 'Continue', this will create an assessment service request for you. You will then be emailed with the details.

html.name: html_limit_message
html.content: You have reached the maximum amount of items (6) which can be requested to be collected.

html.name: ahtm_DMJ7MJ40
html.content: Item 1

html.name: html_subtotal_parent
html.content: £5.00

html.name: ahtm_num_items
html.content: Item

html.name: html_subtotal
html.content: £5.00

field.label: Please select the items you wish to be collected
field.name: sel_itemlist_2016-05-13_woy

Option.label: Carpet - one roll or one bag of carpet pieces
Garden waste other than grass cuttings (Assessment required)
Glass – if smashed in a box
House clearance - large amount of furniture (Assessment required for 6)

FormMeta.name: edinburgh_missed_bin

html.name: ahtm_collection_information
html.content:
Please ensure that your bins remain available for collection from 6.30am until they have been emptied. Please note that some collections may take place in the evening.

This form allows you to report a non-collection of waste or recycling. Our collection crews make a record of the reasons for non-collection of bins (for example your bin may have contained incorrect items, or may not have been left out for collection by 6.30am on collection day).

Please complete this form only if you believe that your bin was missed in error by our waste and recycling crew

To complete this form you will need:

  • Address of uncollected bin

html.name: ahtm_continue33
html.content: When inspection complete, click on the button below to close off your task and reallocate the case to the scheduling team.

html.name: ahtm_bad
html.content: Close the case as incorrectly reported. This will send the customer an email to advise them of this and the email will contain the following reason code (please exercise caution in your language!).

field.label: Case Close Reason (Invalid Case)
field.name: txt_caseclosereasonbad
field.value: The case has been closed as invalid because ....

Button.name: but_IYB01AJ3
Button.label: Confirm - Do you really want to close this pothole as invalid?

html.name: html_LZJ9KO94
html.content:
Schedule the job on the Aardvark 3000 system.  

When you've finished scheduling the work on the system, click on the button below to close off your task and reallocate the case to the crew for repair.

field.label: Attach a photo of the repaired hole
field.name: file_AIY9Q630

html.name: ahtm_continue
html.content: When the repair is complete, click on the button below to close off your task and reallocate the case back to the inspection team for re-inspection.

field.label: Upload a photo or video of the repair
field.name: file_TLV7IS38

field.label: Rate the quality of the repair
field.name: num_PXY44KW9

html.name: html_U5D4UYG0
html.content:
When the reinspection is complete click on the button below to close off your task and close the Pothole case as complete. 

You may amend the case closing code if you wish or leave it as defaulted.

html.name: html_WDL64XW7
html.content:
Your processing of the pothole workflow is now complete and the case has been progressed to stage [txt_case_status].

You may now close this browser window.

html.content: The Customer has requested to be linked to the Request, but has not yet been identified.  Confirm they want to be associated with the existing [typeofissue] case and then search for and select the customer and click on the "Link to Case" button.  There is also the option for the customer to add additional Notes to the Case.

html.name: html_M1X5A676
html.content: That's fine.  We'll note your interest that this be fixed, but be aware that you won't receive any notification when the issue is fixed (since we won't keep a record of who you are!).
